mapper.select: select user_email from user where user_phnum = #{userPhnum} and user_type = '1'
select user_pass from user where user_email = #{email} and user_type = '1'

select * from (select distinct b.auction_no, a.auction_title, a.auction_buy_now, a.auction_limit_date, a.auction_condition, b.user_email, b.bid_price, count(b.auction_no) over() as bitCnt, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY a.auction_no ) as auction_cnt from auction a inner join (select distinct max(bid_price) over(partition by auction_no) as bid_price, auction_no, user_email from bid where user_email = #{email}) b on a.auction_no = b.auction_no where a.auction_condition ='1')ab inner join ( select distinct min(f.file_no) over(partition by a.auction_no) as file_no, a.auction_no from auction a inner join bid b on a.auction_no = b.auction_no inner join file f on a.file_group_code = f.file_group_code where b.user_email = #{email} and a.auction_condition = '1') abf on ab.auction_no = abf.auction_no;

select * , (select count(*) over() as auctionCnt from deal where user_email_seller = #{userEmail} and deal_seller_condition = '1' or user_email_seller = #{userEmail} and deal_buyer_condition = '1') as auctionCnt from auction a where user_email = #{userEmail} and auction_condition = '1' ;
mapper.insert: insert into user(user_email, user_pass, user_phnum, user_nickname, user_type ) values (#{userEmail}, #{userPass},#{userPhnum},#{userNickname}, #{userType});
